channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #198, including every tabletop rpg project started between 06/12 and 07/17
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #198, including every tabletop rpg project started between 06/12 and 07/17. The collections covers a bit more than a months because I had two weeks of vacation and because Kickstarters „bot protection“ managed to kill my will (and ability) to do it for a while as I couldn’t do the searches or open the projects. I found a work around, which makes the compilation take longer, and acquired the energy required and thus am back… (because of the troubles I couldn’t keep track of projects that started & finished inbetween the dates) English Crowdfundings 4 Roleplaying Games 5 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 3 Family-Friendly Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Larp Roleplaying Games 2 (Post-)Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games 2 Trophy Roleplaying Games 5 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games 1 Gamebook 4 Settings 6 Magazines 2 Sourcebooks 7 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 2 Mörk Borg Sourcebooks 2 Adventures 2 D&D 5E & OSR Adventures 12 D&D 5E Adventures 9 Dice Projects 2 D6 Dice Projects 3 D20 Dice Projects 4 Unspecific Dice Projects 3 Accessoires 2 GM Screens 2 Deck of Cards 2 Map Projects 1 VTT 2 Enamel Pins 1 Notebook 3 Movies & Actual Plays 5 Various RPG Projects German Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game French Crowdfundings 1 Sourcebook Portuguese Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/07/18/crowdfunding-collection-198/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #198, including every tabletop rpg project started between 06/12 and 07/17
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #198, including every tabletop rpg project started between 06/12 and 07/17.

The collections covers a bit more than a months because I had two weeks of vacation and because Kickstarters „bot protection“ managed to kill my will (and ability) to do it for a while as I couldn’t do the searches or open the projects. I found a work around, which makes the compilation take longer, and acquired the energy required and thus am back…
(because of the troubles I couldn’t keep track of projects that started & finished inbetween the dates)

English Crowdfundings

4 Roleplaying Games
5 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
3 Family-Friendly Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Larp Roleplaying Games
2 (Post-)Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games
2 Trophy Roleplaying Games
5 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
1 Gamebook
4 Settings
6 Magazines
2 Sourcebooks
7 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 Mörk Borg Sourcebooks
2 Adventures
2 D&D 5E & OSR Adventures
12 D&D 5E Adventures
9 Dice Projects
2 D6 Dice Projects
3 D20 Dice Projects
4 Unspecific Dice Projects
3 Accessoires
2 GM Screens
2 Deck of Cards
2 Map Projects
1 VTT
2 Enamel Pins
1 Notebook
3 Movies & Actual Plays
5 Various RPG Projects

German Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

French Crowdfundings

1 Sourcebook

Portuguese Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/07/18/crowdfunding-collection-198/
